issues_found.description: The React component does not handle errors from the API call properly. It only logs a generic error message to the console.
issues_found.recommendation: Implement proper error handling in the React component, displaying user-friendly error messages based on the error response from the API.

issues_found.description: The API code does not implement any security measures like authentication, authorization, or input validation.
issues_found.recommendation: Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms, and validate user input to prevent security vulnerabilities like SQL injection or cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.

manual_fixes_needed: Implement proper error handling in the React component
Add authentication, authorization, and input validation to the API
